measurement_conditions: Average FPS during a fast scroll (fling) of a list with 500 `AttendanceListItem` widgets in release mode.
test_environment: Physical mid-range Android and iOS devices
improvement_opportunities: Optimizing `build` methods, ensuring `const` constructors are used.
business_relevance: Directly measures compliance with REQ-1-067 and impacts user experience.

measurement_conditions: 99th percentile build time for a single complex widget like `CalendarView` or `AttendanceListItem`.
test_environment: Physical mid-range Android and iOS devices
improvement_opportunities: Breaking down large widgets, caching expensive calculations, reducing rebuilds.
business_relevance: Prevents individual widget inefficiency from causing frame drops and UI jank.
